Well, this game is harder than regular fps coz it has a recoil patern. Need a time to be master on it , also coz this game is a team-based so bring ur friend to play this game too. Too many toxic on public matches but u can mute it. Overall is a great game

very nice game. The skins are what really make it tho ... :)

I love that when russian kid just put his mic in mouth and eating it like taco when you in 1v5 situation, very great comunity, i love when russian plays gta sa + respect song, i even love when they just screaming idi nahui suka blet, jibani loh ti pidar. Very nice.
Help, i dropped my viagra. Im old man.
Tres bon jeu. genial lé mek

Game itself is great! However not every update is good. I think everyone is a little nervous, when map gets updated, because some smokes and spots cannot be used anymore. But sometimes it's useful e.g. inferno. It looks better than the previous one and many players agree with that. In contrast to Nuke. On the previous Nuke I (and my friends) could play all day long and it was a great map. Now it's awful. Previously you needed skill to jump on silos, now it's available for every noob. New graphics can be really nice (like in inferno), but in this case it doesn't fit. Please, bring back the old nuke <3
Classic. The game deserves $. Just buy and headshot later. See u there.

É o seguinte, daqui a dois dias vai fazer 4 anos que jogo esta merda, e ainda tou Silver 2, acham correto? Eu mereço no mínimo Global, e nem vou discutir muito, Obrigado.

Ps: Não comprem o jogo.

Buen juego, considera por mi persona, como uno de los juegos fps más complicados y grandiosos de jugar.
Sigan así
Nice and fun when you don't find russian players.

The game has decent rpg elements, the progression system is great. The classes suck though and there's only like 2-3 to choose from. The story is excellent, by far some of the best storytelling I've come across in all the time playing games. I especially like the twist ending, really top notch stuff. 

It really makes you feel like a terrorist, has a little something for everyone. 3/10
